titles.title: A joint resolution joint resolution relating to increasing the debt limit.
A joint resolution joint resolution relating to increasing the debt limit.

calendar.text: Introduced in the Senate. Pursuant to Public Law 117-71, Ordered Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 184.

action.text: Motion to proceed to consideration of measure agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 50 - 49. Record Vote Number: 497.
Measure laid before Senate by motion.

vote.text: Passed Senate without amendment by Yea-Nay Vote. 50 - 49. Record Vote Number: 498.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.

Rules Committee Resolution H. Res. 852 Reported to House. Providing for consideration of S.J. Res. 33. Provides for one hour of debate, the previous question shall be considered as ordered without intervening motions, and provides for a motion to commit.
Considered under the provisions of rule H. Res. 852.
Providing for consideration of S.J. Res. 33. Provides for one hour of debate, the previous question shall be considered as ordered without intervening motions, and provides for a motion to commit.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on S.J. Res. 33.
The previous question was ordered pursuant to the rule.

vote.text: On passage Passed by the Yeas and Nays: 221 - 209 (Roll no. 449).

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: This joint resolution increases the public debt limit by $2.5 trillion.
